name: Peacebloom
description: Gentle herb used in basic salves and tonics.

name: Silverleaf
description: Common herb that amplifies minor arcane workings.

name: Mageroyal
description: Fragrant blossoms that steady apprentice spellcasters.

name: Kingsfoil
description: Bitter leaf used to treat fevers and infections.

name: Sungrass
description: Potent restorative herb that flourishes on high plains.

name: Ghost Mushroom
description: Pale fungus that blurs the line between worlds.

name: Nightshade
description: Deadly plant used in poisons and forbidden elixirs.

name: Dreamfoil
description: Shimmering fronds that twist dreams and visions.

name: Dragon's Breath Bloom
description: Blazing petals used in high-grade fire elixirs.

name: Eternal Lotus
description: Mythic blossom said to bloom once per age, steeped in pure planar energy.
